protein.specific_function: Required for constitutive membrane traffic. Inhibits GTPase-stimulated Na(+)/H(+) exchange. Also inhibits calcineurin phosphatase activity. Required for activity of SLC9A1/NHE1

reference.reference_text: Lin X, Barber DL: A calcineurin homologous protein inhibits GTPase-stimulated Na-H exchange. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996 Oct 29;93(22):12631-6.
